abstract: Shortly after going public on Friday, shares of BATS were halted, after a series of technical glitches and system errors that affected trading in Apple and other companies. Eventually the exchange pulled its offering.
snippet: Shortly after going public on Friday, shares of BATS were halted, after a series of technical glitches and system errors that affected trading in Apple and other companies. Eventually the exchange pulled its offering.
lead_paragraph: 3:46 p.m. | Updated It should have been a day of celebration for BATS Global Markets.

headline.main: After Stock Debut, BATS Pulls I.P.O.

byline.original: By Michael J. de la Merced and Ben Protess
